disclosure_title: Financial implications and other risks and opportunities due to climate change
comment: The paragraphs partially address the disclosure by acknowledging the importance of understanding and mitigating risks, and working on development plans to address climate change events. However, specific details about the financial implications and substantive changes in operations, revenue, or expenditure are lacking. The mention of the Task Force for Climate-related Financial Disclosures (TCFD) demonstrates some relevance and alignment with stakeholder interest, but the significance of these disclosures to the business and stakeholders could be further clarified.

paragraphs.title: Climate Change
paragraphs.text: Our existing initiatives further our efforts to conduct our operations in a manner that reduces our greenhouse gas emissions and conserves energy and water . By understanding the business risks of climate change , we are better positioned for the future , to understand and mitigate risks and to assess potential opportunities .

paragraphs.title: TCFD RESPONSE
paragraphs.text: We are working on development plans to address these recommendations and to better understand the risks and opportunities posed by climate change events , such as floods , forest fires and rising temperatures on our business , and provide transparent disclosures on our progress

paragraphs.title: TCFD RESPONSE
paragraphs.text: The recommendations set out by the Task Force for Climate-related Financial Disclosures ( TCFD ) provide a framework for reporting on the risks associated with climate change . CT REIT believes in the importance of working to align with TCFD 's four elements of the recommendations : governance , strategy , risk management and metrics .
